attributes.action: promote potatoes as a super carb.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: As we are all aware the government are promoting healthy eating,ie.5 portions of fruit and veg per day. unfortunately this does not include potatoes as they are deemed a carbohydrate. potatoes have more vitamins,fibre,folic acid,etc than rice and pasta.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
